snippet.title: The Pizza Delivery Boy Who Saved the World - Trailer
snippet.description:
A semi-autobiographical game about pizza and the time-travelers who make it.

Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=869890843

It's The Pizza Delivery Boy Who Saved the World! A brand-new visual novel by a former delivery boy who is probably never going to work in the pizza industry again, if his boss finds out he made this game. From the people who brought you Cat President: A More Purrfect Union—a game Kotaku described as "an actual PC video game"—Pizza Boy is sure to delight your taste buds! (And the game is great, too.)

KEY FEATURES:

- A delicious visual novel about pizza and the time-travelers who make it
- Over 80 pages of cheesy dialogue!
- More than 100 original photographs bringing the characters and scenery to life
- Decision-based gameplay with a slice-of-life story
- Pizza so realistic you'll eat your computer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/oharock/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/oharockstudios
